response.overview: When a ghostly legend and a horrifying reality become entwined, what steps would you take to save your own sanity? Haunted by a painful mistake, Robert struggles to come to terms with the aggressive witch hunt building up around him. At the height of his desperate escape he uncovers a strange ancient coin that comes with a disturbing and confused warning. A ghostly apparition and the nightmares of his own past weave together as Robert urgently tries to unearth the truth behind a devastating ghost story and to confront his own fears. The Numismatist is a modern interpretation of the classic ghost story paradigm
response.title: The Numismatist
